MESSAGE.JP: 日、バスターズの練習時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Next morning, it was time for practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Next morning, it was time for practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 日はみんなで中庭に集まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We were all gathered in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were all gathered in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さて、今回の作戦名・オペレーション・リトルラブラブハンターズの活動だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, today we commence the operation 'Operation Little Love-Love Hunters.'❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, today we commence the operation 'Operation Little Love-Love Hunters.'❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「最悪にセンスないな」
理樹@「どうでもいいけどそれ、作戦名とオペレーションって意味かぶってるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not like it matters, but isn't it kind of redundant to repeat ❛operation❜ twice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not like it matters, but isn't it kind of redundant to repeat ❛operation❜ twice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、気にするな」
恭介@「今回だが、まずはガンガン攻めてみる方向だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to try an aggressive approach first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to try an aggressive approach first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「攻めるって…？」
恭介@「とにかくこちらの思いをぶつけることだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we're going to make an explosion of emotions inside her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we're going to make an explosion of emotions inside her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
理樹@「でも、どういう風にぶつけたらいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, how exactly are we going to do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, how exactly are we going to do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなもんビシっと亭主関白っぽく『明日からオレに手作り弁当持ってこい!!』とでも言えばいいんじゃねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just show her who's boss and tell her ❛Starting tomorrow you'll be making me a bento every day!❜ or something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just show her who's boss and tell her ❛Starting tomorrow you'll be making me a bento every day!❜ or something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「果たして…それが最良かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Are you sure... that's the best way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Are you sure... that's the best way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだてめぇ、恋愛の達人みたいなポジションで見下しやがって！　ならてめぇがやってみろよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Get off your high horse, Mr. Love Guru! Why don't you suggest something then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Get off your high horse, Mr. Love Guru! Why don't you suggest something then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえはバカか…そんなもんで作ってくれる女がいたら、逆にこっちが引くぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're stupid... If there really was a girl who'd actually make something for you after that, that would be freaky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're stupid... If there really was a girl who'd actually make something for you after that, that would be freaky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あぁ!?　じゃあてめえやってみろよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The hell? Then you show me how you'd do it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The hell? Then you show me how you'd do it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あぁ、わかったわかった…」
鈴@「んじゃ、おまえらふたりでまずいってみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, why don't you two give it a go first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, why don't you two give it a go first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだな。俺も行くことにしよう。だが、まずは他のメンバーからの方がいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Alright. I'll go too. But, we're going to try it on the other members first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright. I'll go too. But, we're going to try it on the other members first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あんまり俺たちが動いていると怪しまれる…上手くいった方法で理樹が来ヶ谷を誘う、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If we move around too much we'll rouse suspicion... Then, Riki is going to use the method that proved to be the most effective to ask Kurugaya out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If we move around too much we'll rouse suspicion... Then, Riki is going to use the method that proved to be the most effective to ask Kurugaya out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふん…この震えは武者震いだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmph... This trembling, I feel like a warrior going to battle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph... This trembling, I feel like a warrior going to battle...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「恐ろしい勝負だな…」
理樹@「メンバーってことは、相手も選ばないとだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That means you won't get to choose whom you ask out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That means you won't get to choose whom you ask out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、その辺はくじ引きで決めるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't we decide it by drawing lots?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't we decide it by drawing lots?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ってこたぁ…」
恭介@「小毬、クド、三枝、西園の４人だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Komari, Kud, Saigusa, Nishizono, the four of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Komari, Kud, Saigusa, Nishizono, the four of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「あとはどれが誰になるかだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What remains is to decide who goes for whom...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What remains is to decide who goes for whom...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「とりあえず、俺が一番から四番までのくじを作る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll prepare tokens with numbers from one to four.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll prepare tokens with numbers from one to four.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹は番号の割り振りを頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll ask you to assign the numbers, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll ask you to assign the numbers, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん…わかった」
理樹@「クジも一緒に作っちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll help you with making the tokens too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll help you with making the tokens too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうか、じゃあ任せた」
介からルーズリーフとハサミ、ボールペンを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I received a notebook from Kyousuke together with scissors and a pen.
MESSAGE.Translation: I received a notebook from Kyousuke together with scissors and a pen.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、番号の割り振りどうしようかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, how do I go about assigning the numbers?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, how do I go about assigning the numbers?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ず、１番は…。
ゃあ、１番は小毬さんにしよう。
ゃあ、１番はクドにしよう。
ゃあ、１番は葉留佳さんにしよう。
ゃあ、１番は西園さんにしよう。
に、２番は…。
番は小毬さんにしよう。
番はクドにしよう。
番は葉留佳さんにしよう。
番は西園さんにしよう。
ゃ、３番は…。
番は小毬さんかな…。
番はクドかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Alright, Kud will be the third.
MESSAGE.Translation: Alright, Kud will be the third.

MESSAGE.JP: 番は葉留佳さんかな…。
番は西園さんかな…。
ゃあ、後は４番が最後の人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That just leaves the fourth person.
MESSAGE.Translation: That just leaves the fourth person.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これで出来たかな」
直してみる。
たぶん、こんな感じだろう。
恭介@「できたか？」
理樹@「うん」
真人@「よし、じゃあ引くぜ…」
果…真人が一番、謙吾が二番、恭介が三番。
MESSAGE.EN: The results are... Masato is first, Kengo is second, Kyousuke third.
MESSAGE.Translation: The results are... Masato is first, Kengo is second, Kyousuke third.

人が小毬さん。
人がクド。
人が葉留佳さん。
人が西園さん。
吾が小毬さん。
吾がクド。
吾が葉留佳さん。

介が小毬さんだ。

介が西園さんだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝When did I agree to participate in this...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You took part in drawing lots, no bailing out now.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, that tree over there looks like a nice place.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Okay, let's change the target to Komari.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now, let's see what he's gonna do...❞

番の真人が木の下へ向かう。

真人@「明日からオレに手作り弁当持ってこい！」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Starting tomorrow you'll be making me a bento every day!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...It doesn't need to be anything fancy.❞

西園@「いやです」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just your feelings... It doesn't need to be anything tangible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いやです」
西園@「話はそれだけですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Is that all you wanted to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Is that all you wanted to say?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's amazing how you completely swallowed your pride...❞

番の真人が木の下へ向かう。

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Starting tomorrow you'll be making me a bento every day!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Starting tomorrow you'll be making me a bento every day!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah... Did you lose your lunch money?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, so when in trouble we should help each other out～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, I'm busy, so I'll see you later.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did you see that? It was a piece of cake.❞

が、あんまり伝わっていないようだった。

慢気に戻ってくる。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Where's that confidence coming from, after you totally screwed up.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Who ever said I must always be perfect in everything!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, what do you think? Was that a good reference?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...What are you up to? I've been watching you for a while.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: That was the first thing she said.

きっとする。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, from the part where Mr. Kyousuke blew himself up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目的はバレてなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like she didn't find out our purpose, then.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like she didn't find out our purpose, then.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、どうせ良からぬ事でも企画していたのだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I bet you were up to no good anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I bet you were up to no good anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「女の子に声を掛けるなら、なぜ私を誘わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you were inviting girls, why wasn't I called?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you were inviting girls, why wasn't I called?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it would've been bad if I did...❞

理樹@「え、うん、まあ」
理樹@「あ、あのさ…」
おうとするが、言葉が出てこなくなってしまった。

MESSAGE.Translation: When it came down to it, I had trouble getting the words out of my mouth.

MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't even look her in the eyes...

ことさらに顔を覗き込まれる。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, that's quite considerate of you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you intend to thank me for always treating you to tea, I'll gladly accept it.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... Well, let's say that's the plan.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, those feelings of gratitude toward Onee-san are well appreciated.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I don't really have that much money...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Worry not. I wasn't going to make you treat me to any expensive tea either.❞
